subject: Baseball
Memorabilia and Souvenirs
lead_paragraph: Zack Hample, who has made a name for himself by catching balls at major league stadiums, snagged Alex Rodriguez’s 3,000th hit on Friday at Yankee Stadium and refused to give it up.
snippet: Zack Hample, who has made a name for himself by catching balls at major league stadiums, snagged Alex Rodriguez’s 3,000th hit on Friday at Yankee Stadium and refused to give it up.
